name: beat-the-eu
description: Beat the EU is a beat-em-up platformer where you beat the European Council into agreeing to the UK's membership terms.

scripts.build: rollup --format iife --config rollup.config.js --output build/app.js && ln -sf $PWD/node_modules/phaser/dist/phaser.min.js build/phaser.js

author: Joseph Wynn <joseph.wynn@bbc.co.uk>
